name: Hwoj Wrap
flavorText: "The witch doctor was eager to display his martial prowess, and he was especially proud of his enchanted belt, which he claimed gave him great advantage in battle. It was obviously an item of great importance to him and had been in his clan for generations untold." —Abd al-Hazir
flavorTextHtml: "The witch doctor was eager to display his martial prowess, and he was especially proud of his enchanted belt, which he claimed gave him great advantage in battle. It was obviously an item of great importance to him and had been in his clan for generations untold." —Abd al-Hazir

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

secondary.textHtml: Locust Swarm also Slows enemies by 60%. (Witch Doctor Only) [60 - 80]%
secondary.text: Locust Swarm also Slows enemies by 60%. (Witch Doctor Only) [60 - 80]%
